title: Can't Create PBE Account
body: So hi Riot, I recently check my E-mail and found out that actually I was actually accepted as a PBE community member in Feburary, 2015. I didn't check my E-mail much back then so I think I must have missed it. But now that I saw the E-mail it got be really hyped because I always wanted to play on the PBE servers. And then I tried to create my PBE account but when I finish putting in my username and password and click on the Finish Registering button it just says "something went wrong" and would not let me create an account. I want to ask it is because my privilege of making a PBE account removed because I noticed the E-mail so late or is it just an technical problem? Please answer Riot because I really love League of Legends and I would be very happy to play on PBE. Thanks! :D

replies.body: MY SAID I GIOT ACCEPTED BUT THEN I WENT TO THE CREATE ACCOUNT WEBSITE AND IT SAID APPLICATION RECIEVED BUT IT SAID I CAN CREATE WHY IT SAY APPLICATION RECIEVED AGAIN
me too
Same! i was just accepted too {{item:3070}}
Everyone go to the address and double check. Because i just checked and it's one step 3!
It wont even let me go to step 3.
same here jus go accepted as well{{item:3070}}
Yep, me too. I emailed Riot Support but apparently everyone has that issue so that's good.
Same here, emailed support, haven't gotten anything back yet though.
Me too :( I just wanna start already!!

Hey exploadingTNT, this is something we're aware of and are in the process of fixing. It doesn't mean your approval has been rescinded because you weren't fast enough to click on it. Keep an eye out on the PBE Server Status Page to get updated on the status of the signup page--currently it notes that we know about it and we're working on a fix:

http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#pbe

So, i got the email a few months back as well and just noticed. I click on it, and it takes me right back to the page to sign up for pbe. I login with my main, and it takes me directly to test, it doesnt even give me the option to create an account. What do i do?
ME2

> [{quoted}](name=Son Golin,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=f7Gkbbju,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-23T17:45:15.098+0000)
>
> Hey exploadingTNT, this is something we're aware of and are in the process of fixing. It doesn't mean your approval has been rescinded because you weren't fast enough to click on it. Keep an eye out on the PBE Server Status Page to get updated on the status of the signup page--currently it notes that we know about it and we're working on a fix:
> 
> http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#pbe

This is 3 months old now. Problem is still here. Rito plz

The problem was resolved a while ago. If you're still having difficulty with the PBE signup, please contact us through the [Support Site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) so we can further look into this matter.
Oh ok, thanks a lot! :D It worried me before but I feel soooo much better now XD
aha i looked at that yesterday and noticed i was accepted. it freaked me out to when it said "something went wrong".
still not fixed :( riot pls
Yea it really feels long for an impatient person like me :P
Look on the bright side, we were awesome enough to be accepted right?! {{champion:119}}
